item.title: 梅赛德斯首席执行官发言反对限制对华贸易
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）首席执行官奥拉-凯勒纽斯（Ola Kaellenius）周三表示反对限制对华贸易，并强调中国仍是该集团最重要的市场。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Chief Executive Ola Kaellenius on Wednesday spoke against imposing restrictions on trade with China, stressing that the country remains the group's most important market.】

item.title: 巴西 4 月汽车销量和产量均大幅增长
item.description: 巴西汽车制造商协会 Anfavea 周三称，4 月份巴西新车销量为 220,842 辆，环比增长 17.6%。【原文：Brazil's automakers' association Anfavea said on Wednesday that sales of new vehicles in the country rose 17.6% in April from the previous month to 220,842 units.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯否认阻止美国工厂成立工会的说法
item.description: 德国高档汽车制造商梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）周三驳斥了有关其一直试图阻止阿拉巴马州工厂成立工会的说法。【原文：German premium carmaker Mercedes-Benz on Wednesday rejected claims that it has been trying to prevent the formation of a union at its Alabama plant.】

item.title: 富国银行任命费尔南多-里瓦斯为企业与投资银行业务联席首席执行官
item.description: 富国银行周三任命费尔南多-里瓦斯（Fernando Rivas）为企业与投资银行部（CIB）联席首席执行官。【原文：Wells Fargo on Wednesday named Fernando Rivas as the co-CEO of corporate and investment banking (CIB).】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）旗下星链公司（Starlink）获得印度尼西亚运营许可
item.description: 印度尼西亚通信部长周三告诉路透社，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的卫星部门已获得在印尼运营的许可。【原文：The satellite unit of Elon Musk's SpaceX has secured a permit to operate in Indonesia, the communications minister told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国撤销对中国客户的部分出口许可，英特尔收入受挫
item.description: 芯片制造商英特尔（Intel）周三表示，美国商务部将撤销其消费相关产品对中国客户的某些出口许可，此举将影响其第二季度的收入。【原文：Chipmaker Intel said on Wednesday the U.S. Department of Commerce was revoking certain export licenses for its consumer-related items to a customer in China, a move that would impact its second-quarter revenue.】

item.title: 在特斯拉自动驾驶调查中，美国检察官重点关注证券和电信欺诈
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社，美国检方正在调查特斯拉是否在其电动汽车的自动驾驶功能方面误导投资者和消费者，从而构成证券欺诈或电信欺诈。【原文：U.S. prosecutors are examining whether Tesla committed securities or wire fraud by misleading investors and consumers about its electric vehicles’ self-driving capabilities, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 奥地利 Raiffeisen 银行放弃与 Strabag 的交易
item.description: 奥地利贷款银行 Raiffeisen Bank 周三发表声明称，已决定不再继续收购建筑集团 Strabag 的股份。【原文：Austrian lender Raiffeisen Bank has decided not to pursue the acquisition of a stake in construction group Strabag , it said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 艾默生电气因测量工具需求而提升 2024 年利润预期
item.description: 由于生产阀门、调节器和执行器的部门需求稳定，艾默生电气周三上调了全年利润预期，使得这家工程解决方案公司的股价在盘前交易中上涨了约 2%。【原文：Emerson Electric raised its full-year profit forecast on Wednesday on steady demand in its unit that makes valves, regulators and actuators, sending the engineering solutions firm's shares up about 2% in premarket trade.】

item.title: 财报显示广告和人工智能许可收入潜力巨大，Reddit 股价大涨
item.description: 周三，Reddit 股价飙升 14%，因为这家社交媒体公司在上市后的首次财报中，以强劲的收入增长和不断改善的盈利能力令投资者大吃一惊。【原文：Reddit shares soared 14% on Wednesday after the social media firm floored investors with strong revenue growth and improving profitability in the first earnings since its market debut.】

item.title: Teva Pharm 第一季度利润低于预期，收入有所增长
item.description: 梯瓦制药工业公司（Teva Pharmaceutical Industries）公布的第一季度利润增幅低于预期，原因是有形资产减值增加，而仿制药及其治疗偏头痛和亨廷顿氏症的品牌药的销售额则有所增长。【原文：Teva Pharmaceutical Industries reported a smaller than expected rise in first-quarter profit citing higher impairments of tangible assets, while sales of copycat medicines and its branded drugs to treat migraines and Huntington's disease rose.】

item.title: 体育之夏有助于重振全球啤酒销量
item.description: 受体育运动、通胀放缓、天气模式和抵制情绪消退等因素的影响，全球啤酒制造商的啤酒销量在连续几个季度下降后，今年将有所增加。【原文：Global brewers are set to sell more beer this year after several quarters of declines, helped by factors from sports and slower inflation to weather patterns and a fading boycott.】

item.title: 解说：壳牌出售新加坡炼油厂及其市场意义
item.description: 石油巨头壳牌（Shell）周三表示，已同意将其位于新加坡的布科姆炼油厂（世界最大的炼油和贸易中心之一）出售给印尼化工公司PT Chandra Asri和全球贸易公司嘉能可（Glencore）的合资企业，从而将去年开始的出售进程推向高潮。【原文：Oil giant Shell said on Wednesday that it has agreed to sell its Bukom refinery in Singapore - one of the world's largest oil refining and trading centres - to a joint venture of Indonesian chemicals firm PT Chandra Asri and global trading house Glencore, culminating a process that began last year.】

item.title: 加拿大电子商务提供商 Shopify 预测季度收入下滑
item.description: 加拿大电子商务平台 Shopify 周三预测，第二季度营收将出现下滑，原因是在经济不确定和客户消费不振的情况下，注册该平台的商家数量减少。【原文：Canadian e-commerce platform Shopify forecast downbeat second-quarter revenue on Wednesday, as fewer merchants sign up to its platform in the wake of an uncertain economy and tepid customer spending.】

item.title: 纽约时报》第一季度收入超出预期
item.description: 纽约时报》周三公布的季度收入超出预期，主要得益于广告支出的增长和订户的增加。【原文：New York Times beat estimates for quarterly revenue on Wednesday, helped by a pick up in advertising spending and subscriber growth.】

item.title: 优步预计第二季度总预订量低于预期
item.description: 优步周三预测第二季度总预订量低于预期，而前三个月的总预订量也未达到目标，导致其股价在收盘前下跌近 10%。【原文：Uber forecast second-quarter gross bookings below expectations after missing the target for the first three months on Wednesday, sending it shares down nearly 10% before the bell.】

item.title: AerCap 订购了 150 台 CFM 发动机，价值约 30 亿美元
item.description: 全球最大的飞机租赁商 AerCap Holdings NV 周三表示，已经订购了 150 台新的 CFM LEAP 发动机，价值约 30 亿美元。【原文：AerCap Holdings NV has placed an order for 150 new CFM LEAP engines valued at about $3 billion, the world's largest aircraft lessor said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 降价后苹果 iPhone 3 月中国出货量反弹，大增 12
item.description: 中国政府下属研究公司的数据显示，在苹果公司及其零售商降价之后，苹果公司 3 月份在中国的 iPhone 出货量增长了 12%。【原文：Apple 's iPhone shipments in China increased by 12% in March after the company and its retailers reduced prices, according to data from a research firm affiliated the Chinese government.】

item.title: HF 辛克莱季度利润超预期，宣布回购 10 亿美元股票
item.description: 炼油商 HF Sinclair 周三公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于俄罗斯炼油厂停产和美国大修导致燃料供应紧张。【原文：Refiner HF Sinclair beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by tight fuel supplies due to refinery shutdowns in Russia and heavy maintenance in the U.S.】

item.title: 投资者寻求美国加息路径的线索，期货走势低迷
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货表现低迷，此前的强劲涨势将基准股指 S&P 500 指数推升至逾三周高位，原因是投资者希望进一步明确美联储的降息计划。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Wednesday after a strong run of gains that pushed the benchmark S&P 500 to over three-week highs, as investors sought more clarity on the Federal Reserve's plans for interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 宝马首席执行官：欧盟对中国电动汽车征收关税可能适得其反，阻碍绿色交易
item.description: 宝马公司首席执行官周三警告欧盟不要对中国汽车制造商生产的电动汽车征收进口关税，称这可能会破坏欧盟的 "绿色交易 "工业计划，并损害进口中国制造汽车的德国汽车制造商的利益。【原文：BMW's CEO on Wednesday warned against imposing EU import duties on electric vehicles from Chinese automakers, saying it could upend the bloc's Green Deal industrial plan and harm German automakers which import cars made in China.】

item.title: 韩国欢迎美国决定扩大中国石墨在电动汽车中的使用范围
item.description: 美国决定将汽车制造商为含有中国石墨的汽车提供电动汽车税收抵免的资格延长至2026年，韩国周三对此表示欢迎。【原文：South Korea on Wednesday welcomed a U.S. decision to extend automakers' eligibility for electric vehicle tax credits for cars containing Chinese graphite through 2026.】

item.title: Archegos 的 Bill Hwang：他被指控什么罪名？他会被关多久？
item.description: 前 Archegos 资本管理公司负责人黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）及其副手帕特里克-哈里根（Patrick Halligan）在 2021 年数天内倒闭，给全球银行造成数十亿美元的损失。【原文：The trial of former Archegos Capital Management head Sung Kook “Bill” Hwang and his deputy Patrick Halligan opens on Wednesday over their role in the failure of the investment firm, which collapsed in a span of days in 2021, causing billions of dollars in losses at global banks.】

item.title: Bill Hwang 因其价值 360 亿美元的 Archegos 基金崩溃而受审
item.description: 黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）因 Archegos 资本管理公司（Archegos Capital Management）倒闭而受到的敲诈勒索刑事审判将于本周三开庭，陪审员的挑选将决定黄成国和一名副手在 2021 年短短几天内瓦解的大规模股票交易计划中是否触犯了法律。【原文：Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang's criminal racketeering trial over the collapse of Archegos Capital Management begins on Wednesday with the selection of jurors who will decide if he and a deputy broke the law in a massive stock scheme that unraveled in just days in 2021.】

item.title: TC 能源公司的石油管道分拆项目在押注美国海湾地区时面临障碍
item.description: TC 能源公司计划分拆石油管道，赌它能向美国墨西哥湾炼油厂供应更多加拿大原油，但该企业面临激烈竞争，启动时将背负高额债务。【原文：TC Energy's planned oil pipeline spin-off is a bet that it can supply more Canadian crude to U.S. Gulf of Mexico refiners, but the venture faces stiff competition and will carry high debt when it starts up.】

item.title: 早间竞价：瑞典减产，石油价格下滑，股市活跃
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 独家报道美国着眼于遏制中国获取 ChatGPT 等应用程序背后的人工智能软件
item.description: 消息人士称，拜登政府准备开辟一条新战线，努力保护美国的人工智能免受中国的侵害，初步计划在最先进的人工智能模型（Models）（ChatGPT 等人工智能系统的核心软件）周围设置防护栏。【原文：The Biden administration is poised to open up a new front in its effort to safeguard U.S. AI from China with preliminary plans to place guardrails around the most advanced AI Models, the core software of artificial intelligence systems like ChatGPT, sources said.】

item.title: 大韩航空向美国航空航天公司 Sierra Nevada 出售五架喷气机
item.description: 大韩航空在周三提交的一份交易所文件中表示，将向美国航空航天公司内华达山脉公司（Sierra Nevada Corporation）出售五架飞机。【原文：Korean Air will sell five of its planes to U.S. aerospace firm Sierra Nevada Corporation, the airline said in an exchange filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 拜登将在战场威斯康星州公布微软 33 亿美元的人工智能投资
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统乔-拜登将于周三访问政治必争之地威斯康星州，宣布微软公司耗资33亿美元建造高科技数据中心的计划，这将创造数千个就业机会。【原文：President Joe Biden will visit the political battleground state of Wisconsin on Wednesday to announce plans by Microsoft Corp to build a $3.3 billion high-tech data center that will create thousands of jobs, the White House said.】

item.title: 全球经济信号不一，股票和债券摇摆不定
item.description: 投资者已经从为美国经济衰退做准备，转变为为世界最大经济体继续保持强劲势头做好准备。【原文：Investors have gone from bracing for a U.S. recession to positioning for the world's biggest economy to keep chugging along.】
